62  inline void subscribe(std::string topic_name_pose,std::string topic_name_twist)
63  {
64  this->sub_pose_=this->nh_.subscribe(topic_name_pose,10,&InputPoseTwist::setPose,this);
65  this->sub_twist_=this->nh_.subscribe(topic_name_twist,10,&InputPoseTwist::set,this);
66  }

68  inline void set(geometry_msgs::TwistStamped msg)

71  inline void setPose(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped msg)
72  {tf::poseMsgToTF(msg.pose,this->pose_);this->time_=msg.header.stamp;}
73 
74  inline void setLinVel(geometry_msgs::TwistStamped msg)
75  {

77  }
78 
79  inline void setAngVel(geometry_msgs::TwistStamped msg)
